amendment.description: An amendment numbered 152 printed in Part A of House Report 118-216 to reduce the salary of Shawn Skelly, Assistant Secretary of Defense for Readiness to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 150 - 282 (Roll no. 434).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 150 - 282 (Roll no. 434).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
